name: al-noon-dashboard
description: Al-noon admin dashboard - full stack (backend + frontend)

scripts.install:all: cd admin-dashboard && npm ci && cd ../server && npm ci
scripts.build: cd admin-dashboard && npm ci && npm run build && cd ../server && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.test: cd server && npm run test && cd ../admin-dashboard && npm run test
scripts.lint: cd server && npm run lint && cd ../admin-dashboard && npm run lint
scripts.prepush: npm run test:server && npm run test:integration && npm run test:admin
scripts.test:e2e: cd server && npm run seed:test && cd ../admin-dashboard && npm run test:e2e
